text: Running on Waves () is a 1967 Soviet drama movie directed by Pavel Lyubimov.Гильдия актеров возьмет на себя часть расходов на лечение Маргариты ТереховойБЕГУЩАЯ ПО ВОЛНАМ (1967) It stars Sava Hashamov, Rolan Bykov, and Margarita Terekhova. == Actors == * Sava Hashamov as Garvey * Rolan Bykov as Captain Chez * Margarita Terekhova as Biche Seniel / Frezi Grant * Natalya Bogunova as Daisy * Oleg Zhakov as Proctor * Yevgeni Fridman as Butler == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1967 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies
title: Running on Waves
